item.title: TOST
item.description: score:61 Chances: Interest rate cuts expected by April may benefit high-growth companies that had difficulty accessing capital last year. There are terrific buying opportunities in beaten-down growth stocks right now. Toast has continued to grow in a challenging economy, and more growth could change the market’s tune in a new year.
